privacy.title: Cookie Settings
privacy.mainText: We use cookies and similar technologies on our website. Some are technically necessary, while others help us improve this website and your experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Essential cookies enable basic functions and are necessary for the proper functioning of the website.

analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
analytics.description: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Marketing cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to visitors on other websites.
